text: Today we are going to learn the Alphabets.
‘A’ is the first letter we need to find.
He is hiding behind the Lamp Post

Hi Bob!
‘A’ Will you join me?
What are you doing up there ‘B’?
I was looking for you, and here you are!

Look kids there ‘C’ is!
He seems to be going somewhere.
I am going to the park.
Why don’t you join us instead?

‘D’ What are you doing behind the trees?
I am playing Hide and Seek

Will you join me on a fun ride?
Yes!

Hi ‘E’! How are you?
Would you like to join us?

Hi Bob! I’m fine. Thank you!
Yes I would love to join you.

Hi Bob!
I am going to meet ‘H’!

Hi ‘H’,  Hi Bob! 
‘G’ lets join Bob!
Kids the next letters are ‘I’ and ‘J’
They will take us to the floating islands.

I’m going to the floating islands too!
Both of you join us!

Kids look at ‘K’.
He is on the swing.
Bob! can I join my friends ‘ I’ & ‘J’
Wait for me. I wanna come too.

What are you doing?
Hi Bob I am going home.
Why don’t you join us instead?

Hi ‘ N’  Hi ‘O’
Hi Bob! Hi Bob!

I’m trying to find ‘Q’.
Can you help me find ‘Q’

Where ‘Q’ is?
Hiding behind the house.
Hi Bob! I am going to the city
Hi ‘U’ and ‘V’ will you come with me to meet ‘W’
Yes! We are going to meet ‘W’ too! Let's go together!
Hi Bob! I am waiting for my friends ‘T’ , ‘V’ and ‘U’

Yes!
They are aboard, why don’t you join them?
Look at all our friends, could we join them too Bob?
This was fun! See you next time.
Do you wanna go on an alphabet ride with me?
Lets start from z this time
Did you enjoy the alphabet with "Bob The Train" ?
I know a many little songs all about Phonics
Let me help you learn the Phonics
I is for Ice - Cream , III..Ice - Cream
M is for Mailbox, MMM.. Mailbox
M is for Moon, MMM.. Moom
N is for Nail, NNN.. Nail
N is for Nine, NNN.. Nine
Q is for Question Mark, QQQ..Question Mark
U is for Umbrella, UUU... Umbrella
U is for Unicycle, UUU... Unicycle
V is for Vase, VVV... Vase
V is for Violet, VVV... Violet
W is for White, WWW... White
W is for Watermelon,  WWW... Watermelon
X is for Xylophone, XXX... Xylophone
X is for X- Box, XXX... X-Box
Y is for Yellow, YYY... Yellow
Y is for Yogurt, YYY... Yogurt
Z is for Zero, ZZZ... Zero
Z is for Zebra, ZZZ... Zebra
Hi I am Bob The Train
I love to play with numbers
And dance to the number song
Come back soon to play with "Bob The Train"
Hi I am Bob and I want to help you to learn the numbers
Let us count all the objects on my wagon
I hope you are doing good...
Its good to see you Bob
Its good to see you Bob !
Lets count the numbers one more time
Hi kids how are you doing today ?
Let’s all get ready, because today we’re going to play!
With colorful shapes and have lots of fun .
Let all shapes introduce themselves one by one!
My four sides are just the same,
Turn me around , I don’t care ,
I’m always the same, I’m a square!
Watch me turn round and round,
I’m a circle! I’m a circle!
My four sides are not the same ,
Two are short and two are long ,
Count my sides , and come along,
Up the hill and to the top ,
Down the hill and then you stop ,
Straight across , tell me what you’ve got,
A triangle! Yes I’m a triangle!
Play with shapes and build something more.
Now let’s show our wonderful skills.
A beautiful house of shapes we will build!
My four sides are the same.
Now look aloof. And tell me the shape of a roof!
Yes! Let’s place it at a perfect angle!
We’re going strong! Now name me a shape with  4 sides, 2 short 2 long?
And such a beautiful house we have built!
We might want to go someplace far.
So let’s all of us build a car!
which shape goes round and round with no end , can you tell?
Yes a circle it is. Let’s place it like this.
A shape with 2 long sides and 2 short sides,
Yes it’s a rectangle , and let’s place it so!
Which shape with four equal sides shall we place on the top?
Yes it’s a square, in place let it drop !

Using all the shapes, 
a wonderful car we have made!
For resting let’s make a tree.
Let’s start with a rectangle this time.
Which other shape should we use?
CIRCLE? RECTANGLE? OH PLEASE TELL US! ]
Ok, some triangles we shall choose!
Wow that looks like a beautiful tree.
Kids now let’s build something more.
How about a pretty little seesaw ?
YES, ON A SEESAW WE CAN PLAY!
OK which shape should we start with now?
A triangle will be perfect for our seesaw!
Now we need a shape with 2 sides short and 2 sides long .
YES, LET’S BUILD A RECTANGLE ALONG!
Now let’s gently place it down.
Look, we have made a seesaw on our own!
I’m having so much fun today!
We need to sit and eat somewhere.
Let’s build a table and some chairs.
We’ll use 4 rectangles for the legs. Let’s place them all at this angle.
That looks great, thank you rectangle!
Now let’s take a shape that’s round.
Kids can you tell me where that can be found?
Yes it’s a circle, let’s place it on the top!
There’s our lovely table, even prettier than from a shop!
Now let’s call squares and rectangles to build our chairs.
That looks wonderful, now we can all sit somewhere!
Thank you shapes , I had so much fun today.
See you next time for more fun and play!
Mr. Circle Mr. Circle your so round and round and round
U can roll on the ground, U can roll all  over around
Mr. Circle Mr. Circle your so round and round and round
U can roll on the ground, U can roll all around
Take care of your four sides and your four corners too..
Take care of your four sides and your four corners too..
U look like a pyramid want you join on my train as Mr square did....
U look like a pyramid want you join on my train as Mr square did....
Are you looking at the sky, Your friends will come out in the night so very high...
Are you looking at the sky, Your friends will come out in the night so very high...
Or you will join us too.. My wagons  are comfortable and shape just like you..
Or you will join us too.. My wagons  are comfortable and shape just like you..
'' Good morning '' How do you do..
Look your friends are all a bold want you join us too..
'' Good morning '' How do you do..
Look your friends are all a bold want you join us too..
It started at the crack of dawn.
A day the children would never forget.
The children woke up as early as their eyes would allow
Look at what the color monster has done!
It's stolen all of the lovely colors from our land.
"We cannot possibly play in a land without color.
What are we going to do?"
Disappointed at the old antics of the color monster.
"There is someone who can help us."
He's blue and yellow and got lots of brain."
And before they could settle down,
There came a voice from behind them.
Look at what the color monster has done.
He took away all the bright lovely colors from our playground.
Bob doesn't like to see his friends upset.
And I'm going to help you fix this."
"Just leave the worries to me, and you think about enjoying your holidays.
As all the children eagerly awaited Bob,
He came by, his coach full of surprise goodies for them.
"What do you have for us Bob?
We can't hold the excitement in any longer."
I have here for each of you,
A coloring book with all the lovely colors you children have been missing, so much!"
“But what do we do with these books Bob.
How will they help make our playground colorful again?
"Nothing is impossible when Bob the train is around!
These books are no ordinary coloring books, children.
He lowered his voice like he was about to tell the children a secret.
"Well children, this is only between us.
But anything you draw and color in this book springs to life.
So you kids can draw anything you like in these books
And your dull, lifeless playground will spring alive in no time."
Whoever heard of a magical coloring book."
This is no joke, my lovely friends.
It's as true as the day and night!
"So we can draw anything in the book?"
"Absolutely! Anything you want this playground to be!"
Now the kids couldn't wait to get their hands on these magical coloring books
Bob was surrounded with lovely hyper children
And this is something he enjoyed more than anything in the world.
With a coloring book in each of their hands and a bunch of crayons
The little kids sat down with the task of renovating their playground.
The little one wasted no time in coloring the lifeless ground.
With each stroke of her crayon, the ground came alive.
One green stroke at a time.
And in 4 seconds flat the white ground was greener than ever!
"This really is a magical coloring book!"
Bob traveled through the ground to see what his lovely friends were drawing.
"I'm drawing tall mountains, that go all the way up to the sky and touch the clouds."
"But there's something still missing in the blue sky my dear."
"Well, can you think of something that's yellow in color
With bright orange rays that light up the morning sky?"
I'm going to draw it so it looks like it's playing peek a boo with the mountains!"
Your coloring seems so rushed, it looks like someone is having trouble staying inside the lines."
"I can't wait to play on the swing and the slide.
I'm going to color them red and yellow and violet
And all the nice colors i can think of!"
Bob was standing next to Mary and looking into her book.
"What are you drawing my little friend?"
"I'm drawing green trees, so when i'm tired of playing,
I can come rest under the cool shade!
"This is for when we’re hungry and need a healthy snack."
That's mighty smart of you little one!"
Bob laughed and walked away just in time..
Because an apple fell down, right where Bob was standing.
Jack was so engrossed in his drawing, he did not notice bob standing right next to him.
"Haha. I enjoyed watching you draw with such attention.
May i ask, what masterpiece are you in the process of making?"
Everyone knew he was the best artist among all of them, but he never liked flaunting his art!
I'm drawing us a little house that we can use to store all our toys
And this magical coloring book and the crayons.
I wouldn't want to lose this, ever!
Also, I'm drawing a fence all around the park, so the color monster cannot come in again!"
"What about other children that want to play in this new colorful park
Bob looked around proudly at his little artist friends.
While Bob was in his own thoughts..
The little one came up to him with the book in her hand.
Bob was ecstatic to see his little friends happy at last.
"Well i hope you kids are happy now?"
Thank you so much for helping us and saving our holidays!
What would we do without you!"
"This playground wouldn't look so beautiful without all your efforts.
And I promise, the color monster won't be here to trouble you children
Bob was in the middle of all the fanfare.
He looked around and saw all the children enjoying themselves.
They had forgotten about the color monster.
They had forgotten that only a few hours ago their playground was colorless
And with their little creative hands and talented minds, they restored it to it's full glory!

There will be fun and games

Do you know the animals abc song?
Let’s sing it, with Bob the Train!
Look at him hop on his paws
His trunk goes on and on!
It’s tongue sticks out so long!
I can only see him halfway
She can lie in the river all day
It looks like a little Dinosaur
He’s got a thousand spots and more!
King of the jungle he’s crowned
She’s sure got a handful of arms
Isn’t it funny how he walks!
Those are eggs she’s sitting on
We better be careful that horn!
She can only be found in the sea
I think this one’s feeling sleepy
It’s horns do catch your eyes
She can fly so high in the sky
I wonder how it’s teeth grew?
You can almost see right through
I think she feels very cold!
That was the Animals ABC Song!
Then come back soon, with Bob The Train!
Hey! I am Bob The Train
And travel to far away places
I also carry Goods from one place to another.
Let's go and meet the other modes of transport!
I am going out for a picnic.
What do you do? Mr. Police Car
Police men sit inside me to catch thieves!
That's a brave Job, fighting against injustice!

There are people trapped in a fire,
I'm going to save them with the help of firefighters!
I'm going to carry the sick and injured people to the hospital.
What are you doing garbage truck?

Hey Bob!
I'm helping forklift by moving the obstacles

Hi Bob!
I'm helping with loading and unloading
Look at the helicopter, fly away.
I tow away the wreck and the disabled cars?
I hope you kids had fun learning the different modes of transport!

Shall we go on a numbers counting ride
with Bob the Train?

quack quack quack

bounce bounce bounce

 tick tock tick

ding dong ding

beep beep beep

swish swish swish

woof woof woof

Eight noisy drums bang bang bang;
bang bang bang

Nine ringing phones tringg tringg tringg;
tringg tringg tringg...

Ten pretty balloons pop pop pop;
pop pop pop...

Do you want to take a ride around the town?
The wheels on the train go round and round, round and round, round and round
The wheels on the train go round and round, all through the town!
The horn on the train goes toot, toot, toot, toot, toot, toot, toot, toot, toot.
The horn on the train goes toot, toot, toot, all through the town!
The engine on the train goes chug chug chug, chug chug chug, chug chug chug.
The engine on the train goes chug chug chug, all through the town!
The wagons on the train go up and down, up and down, up and down.
The wagons on the train go up and down, all through the town!
The babies on the train goes waah waah waah, waah waah waah, waah waah waah,
The babies on the train goes waah waah waah, all through the town!
The mommies on the train go shush, shush, shush, shush, shush, shush, shush, shush, shush,
The mommies on the train go shush, shush, shush, all through the town!
The passengers on the train go bounce, bounce, bounce, bounce, bounce, bounce, bounce, bounce, bounce,
The passengers on the train go bounce, bounce, bounce, all through the town!
The tracks under the train go rattle rattle rattle, rattle rattle rattle, rattle rattle rattle.
The tracks under the train go rattle rattle rattle, all through the town!
Did you enjoy Bob the Train?
